transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yeah.
Customer: Atul sir very good morning.
Customer: Good morning ma'am.
Executive: Yes sir, Pooja baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Boliye madam.
Executive: Yes sir, ye aapka empowered solution ke regarding aapne time diya nahi tha us time aap busy the.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To possible hoga ki aaj hum meeting ke through isko proper kar sake sir.
Customer: Actually madam enquiries hi nahi aa rahe.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Enquiries hi nahi aa rahe madam.
Executive: Ji sir enquiry nahi aa rahi hai isiliye to mai keh rahi hu sir ek baar just hum by agar meeting nahi madam aap bolenge to enquiry aayenge kya abhi?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir, ye hota hai na ki pehle mai just aapka catalog category saari cheeze check ki jaise ek se pehle dekhiye ye tha na sir ki aapko proper saari cheeze nahi aa rahi thi lead kaise consume karna hai ya overall follow up kaise lena hai wo cheeze nahi pata tha.
Customer: Wo sab malum hai madam lead kaise lena hai sab kar rahe hai hum lekin lead hi nahi hai to kaha se lene ka.
Executive: Sir lead mai aapko bata de rahi hu lead nahi aane ka ye bhi reason hai na bahut saare product ko aapne auto ko stop kar rakha hai sir aur aap usme deal bhi kar rahe hai aisa nahi ki nahi kar rahe sir to iski wajah se to problem hogi abhi dekhiye mai aapse baat karte karte sir mai bolu ki thik hai mai use activate kar leti hu to koi bhi catalog me agar aap changes aapke hona hai na sir to wo by video meeting sir possible nahi hai kyuki video meeting recorded hoti hai aur aapki permission hogi tabhi aapke yaha pe products me catalog me kuch bhi update hum kar sakte hai.
Executive: Ab sir agar aise mai baat karte karte aapse keh du nahi sir wo cheeze mai kar lungi to wo kaise hoga.
Customer: Wo complicated hai madam ha boliye madam.
Executive: Possible ho sir mai meeting ki link aapko share karu.
Executive: Mobile se join kar lijiye sir mai apni screen share karungi aap just mujhe batate jaaiye wo cheeze mai sirf update kar dungi jisse aapko proper leads enquiries aana shuru ho.
Customer: Are kya samajh me nahi aa raha madam bahut time waste hota hai ha boliye madam.
Executive: Sir hello.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Sir time ha mai ye keh rahi hu mai aapki registrar mail id pe mai aapko yaha pe link share karungi sir thik hai.
Customer: Mobile se just join karna ha aap mere ko ek baar registrar mail id aapke paas login hogi ya yaha pe updated hai.
Customer: Ha thik hai madam link bhejiye na madam.
Executive: Ek minute sir.
Customer: Uff Allah.
Executive: Sir jo mail id aapki hai abdulhakmuzawwar@gmail.com us par aap check karenge Pooja ke naam se mail aaya hoga aapke paas.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Check kiya mail receive hua aapko.
Executive: Sir meeting me voice aapko aa payegi ye normal call mai disconnect karungi yaha pe continue karu.
Customer: Ha continue.
Executive: Meeting me voice aa rahi hai aapko.
Executive: Nahi aa rahi hai aapne desktop pe join kiya sir.
Executive: Abdul sir idhar abhi dekhenge jaise mai jo aapse keh rahi thi na irrelevancy aa rahi hai ye unhe kya cheeze ho rahi hai mai aapko batate chalti hu ek baar just mai aapka catalog open karu thik hai.
Executive: Yaha par dekhenge sir jo abhi tak aapki service apni run hui hai na abhi aap yaha 27 August ko hi aaye the apni meeting pehli hi baar hui thi jisme maine service kaise use karna hai iske baare me bataya tha aapne Belgaavi, Vijayapura, Chitradurga, Bellari, Hubli Bagalkot aur Udupi in saare location me aapne visibility banayi hai aap yaha pe proper yaha pe active to hai sir lekin jo aap lead le rahe hai na wo proper uska follow up nahi ho pa raha hai.
Executive: Pehli cheez ye hai dusra dekhenge aapko jo call kahi call answer kiya hai aapne mujhe batayenge yaha pe inactive me 10 product aapke show kar rahe hai sir to ye 10 product ka kya hai isme deal bhi karte hai sir kyuki iski wajah se main hai jo irrelevancy ho rahi hai 125 KVA Mahindra diesel generator.
Customer: Ha ji.
Executive: Deal karte hai isme ya nahi karte hai sir.
Customer: Nahi madam.
Executive: Karte hai na dekhiye aapka ye main product hai aur already inactive hai mai ise activate kar du sir.
Customer: Ye nikal do madam.
Executive: Ise nahi karna hai.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha nahi karna hai madam nikal do.
Executive: Achha thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai nahi karna wo apni taraf se aap delete kar lijiye dusra 125 KVA Tata DC genset for sale only three years isme bhi sir.
Customer: Ye bhi nikal do delete kiya madam.
Executive: Okay ELGI PG 37.
Customer: Ye bhi nikal do madam.
Executive: Ye bhi hatana hai 10 KVA high chain diesel generator.
Customer: Ha ye rehne do madam.
Executive: Ye rehne do activate karte hai ise.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Thik hai.
Executive: NDPK D water spring centrifugal pump.
Customer: Ha rehne do madam.
Executive: Ise bhi rehne de activate kar de sir.
Customer: Activate.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Ab dobara aath product bache hai 125 KVA Mahindra diesel generator.
Customer: Ha rehne do madam.
Executive: Ise bhi rehne de okay.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye sir isme bahut saare aise product nikal rahe hai jisme aap already deal karte hai high pressure carbon dioxide system installation.
Customer: Nahi madam.
Executive: Nahi karte.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Qmin Qmin active hai.
Customer: Active hai.
Executive: Ise activate karna hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Inactive tha sir ye saare product na inactive hai aapko ye dekhiye inactive dikh raha hai to 125 KVA abhi aapne bataya hatana hai use 125 ise bhi hatana hai ELGI screw air compressor hatana hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm ye five bhi hatana hai iska bataiye 25 KVA Kirloskar.
Customer: Rehna chahiye.
Executive: Ye rehna chahiye activate kar de.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai abhi dekhiye sir itne product activate ho gaye hai inactive se dekhiye ye product hai jo aapke delete hone hai 125 KVA Tata ELGI 37 10 KVA high pressure correct.
Customer: Ha madam.
Executive: Ab ye delete jo hona hai wo aapki taraf se hoga sir kaise karna hai mai aapko bata de rahi hu aap pehle total 38 tha isme mujhe ye 125 KVA diesel Mahindra diesel generator ki mujhe price batayenge kya hai.
Executive: Iska price kya hoga sir.
Customer: Kaunsa madam.
Executive: 125 KVA Mahindra diesel generator.
Customer: 125 KVA 12 lakhs.
Executive: Kitna?
Customer: 12 lakhs.
Executive: 10 lakhs.
Customer: 12 12.
Executive: 12 lakhs.
Executive: Thik hai 12 lakhs per piece okay iska mujhe batayega isme power kya hoga 125 KVA power important 125 hoga.
Customer: 125 hai na.
Executive: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay iska genset rating ke liye kya hoga sir.
Customer: 100 100.
Executive: Isme 100 okay iska duty kya hai prime ya aur standby hai.
Customer: Prime hai.
Executive: Prime hai fuel tank capacity kitni hai isme.
Customer: 180 sir.
Executive: 185 number of cylinder four okay number of pages kitne hai sir four four madam okay okay four thik hai three number of pages one frequency sorry sir frequency 50 hertz.
Executive: Engine model engine model chodo madam change hote rehte hai.
Executive: Isko chhod de.
Customer: Ha usko chhod dijiye madam kyuki change hote rehte hai.
Executive: Achha achha thik hai iska weight kitna hoga sir.
Customer: Weight 2200 kg.
Executive: 2200 kg.
Executive: Thik hai abhi dekhiye sir iska score abhi 38 madam mujhe pura coming ka aur ka pehla chahiye madam ye sab itna important nahi hai.
Executive: Coming kya keh rahe hai.
Executive: Ek minute just ek minute sir call pe rahiye please.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough buyleads.

- Wants to remove some products from catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive shared meeting link to assist.

- Removed some products from the catalog.

- Activated some products in the catalog.

- Collected details of a product from customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will delete products from their end.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, products, subscription
